sql_fr_run: with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-metric)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_redist_sls sa where sa.gl_date between trunc(current_date, 'mm') and date_add(trunc(add_months(current_date, 1), 'mm'), -1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_23' and table_name = 'txn_redist_sls') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-metric)/metric*100) as metric from ((select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_dir_sls sa where sa.gl_date between trunc(current_date, 'mm') and date_add(trunc(add_months(current_date, 1), 'mm'), -1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select  metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_23' and table_name = 'txn_dir_sls') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name)) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-metric)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_hub.txn_udef_order_adjs sa where sa.gl_date between trunc(current_date, 'mm') and date_add(trunc(add_months(current_date, 1), 'mm'), -1) and upper(sa.franchise_nm)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select  metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_23' and table_name = 'txn_udef_order_adjs') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp
Select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from dq_output_table where entity_id in (201,202,203)
